activity.longName: Instructions for selecting, gathering information, sorting, visualizing to assess equity and resilience in your community
activity.objectives: Assess how resilient and equitable your community's built, natural, and social environment systems are to disasters and climate change, using key indicators.
activity.description: Convene discussions about equitable resilience with community constituencies.
activity.materials: Easel Pad Sticky notes Markers SVA table/cards Hazards ID
activity.time: 1) Kickoff meeting with the core team and community members to discuss Chapter 4 objectives and select indicators that are relevant to where you live (2 hours). 2) Gather data and information to help you answer the indicator questions for each system and sector. 3) Community workshop where you will sort indicators by their relative resilience and equity into a 4-quadrant diagram and discuss the results of the assessment (time to plan; 2 hours for the workshop)
activity.who: The project core team and any additional community members
